name: CPU witch
description:
I once had a dream of a witch that was a combination of a character from the film Dreams by Kurosawa Akira and a feeling from Pulse by Kurosawa Kiyoshi. This collage of the films pertinent clips is the recreation of my nightmare of the witch. The audio aspect of the piece is made from layers of my own experimental and noise work as well as my vocalizations of how the witch spoke to me.
For the Month of October I am weaving these nightmares and visions from my past into pieces to recreate for others to experience the fear.
